biotools.summary:
Fast reconstruction of cancer evolutionary history using pairwise mutation relationships.

Pairtree infers the phylogeny underlying a cancer using genomic mutation data. Pairtree is particularly suited to settings with multiple tissue samples from each cancer, providing separate estimates of subclone frequency from each sample that constrain the set of consistent phylogenies.

bioschemas.name: Pairtree
